originalText.text: I've had a great experience renting from AJ Clarke! The building is well maintained with very friendly and helpful doormen. Management was always quick to respond to my messages and overall I highly recommend renting from this management company!

text.text: I've had a great experience renting from AJ Clarke! The building is well maintained with very friendly and helpful doormen. Management was always quick to respond to my messages and overall I highly recommend renting from this management company!

originalText.text: I thoroughly enjoyed my time at their apartment in East Harlem (108th St). AJ Clarke’s management was exceptionally professional and responsive, promptly addressing concerns. The superintendent's proactive approach ensured the building was well-maintained, promptly resolving issues. Overall, it was a positive living experience with excellent management and a dedicated superintendent.

text.text: I thoroughly enjoyed my time at their apartment in East Harlem (108th St). AJ Clarke’s management was exceptionally professional and responsive, promptly addressing concerns. The superintendent's proactive approach ensured the building was well-maintained, promptly resolving issues. Overall, it was a positive living experience with excellent management and a dedicated superintendent.

originalText.text: I was tenant in one of their buildings for a year and it was such a pleasant experience. My super was very responsive and always help to work around my work schedule to ensure that I was able to get any small ticket serviced. One time I got locked out and he event came out his free time to ensure I got into the building. Rob is also great over at the Agency he helped me end to end with the leasing process and I was throughly pleased with their response times! Overall one of my favorite apartments I've lived in during my time in NYC!

originalText.text: AJ Clarke is a Fantastic company, I’ve been a tenant for a few years and intend on staying for many years to come. These guys are responsive, fair, and considerate. Highly recommended

text.text: AJ Clarke is a Fantastic company, I’ve been a tenant for a few years and intend on staying for many years to come. These guys are responsive, fair, and considerate. Highly recommended

originalText.text: After living in my building for 2 years, I sincerely regret that I have to move and let go of AJ Clarke as my property manager. I dealt mostly with Robert Gordon as my agent, but I communicated with a number of others in the office during my time in this building. This company has been incredibly communicative and  helpful. Perhaps most impressively, Robert was always ready to problem-solve with me and totally devoid of any judgment when I approached him with certain difficulties that he had no duty to assist me with. My building's super was so kind and made himself available 24/7 for emergencies. When I needed repairs, I never waited more than a few hours before he arrived to look at the problem. The building had a fire over the summer (due to a resident's improper storage of electrical devices, I believe), and nearly immediately, the building had industrial-sized air purifiers spaced out evenly throughout the building for months until the smell was gone. I am seriously nervous about having to embark on a rental journey with a new property manager (their website was the first place I looked for listings -- unfortunately, none in the area I need to move to). Companies that genuinely care about their residents are rare, and I hit the jackpot with AJ Clarke! If you're looking for an apartment, check AJ Clarke first, I'm serious. You can't miss with these guys!
